attributes.action: Consider reform of the Law for Medicinal uses of Cannabis in the U.K..
attributes.background: The U.K. Is a major exporter of cannabis for medicinal use yet Goverment currently claims it has no medicinal value. The husband of current Government Minister for Drug reform is financially benefiting from this export. Lack of Reform seems to ideologically driven and ignoring medical evidence.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/213973
